column4: Would someone be willing to give me a hand with a problem I am having with installing Ubuntu via flash drive?
I've done it. Cyanogenmod website has a pretty easy tutorial.
What problem are you having with the flash drive?

Well, I made my USB drive a bootable device, and have tested it out on a desktop. Boots and installs fine. I tried it on my laptop, and it just locks up at a black screen with "SYSLINUX 4.03, ect. The copyright info, basicly.
